title: ID font
content: Hi, could you please help me to identify this font( picture attached)? Or do you have any ideas for similar fonts? Thanks a lot :)
author: zuz

comments.content:
This is not a font as it, more custom job. You could easily redo the same by picking any gothic condensed of your choice and some slab serifs (strokes) to terminals.  
If you still need a close base font (possibly even matching), you can use [Steelfish](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620215026/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/steelfish) or [Trump Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620215026/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic).
